summary: This document outlines the Articles of Organization for Zorro Management, LLC, including its purpose, management structure, and liability limitations. It identifies Brett Geary as the organizer and provides details about the company's registered agent and addresses in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Brett Geary
persons.context: Brett Geary is identified as the organizer of Zorro Management, LLC, and is responsible for signing the Articles of Organization.

persons.name: Gina Marie Bryan
persons.context: Gina Marie Bryan is the notary public who witnessed the signing of the Articles of Organization by Brett Geary.

persons.name: Business Basics VL LLC
persons.context: Business Basics VL LLC is designated as the resident agent for Zorro Management, LLC, responsible for service of process.

connections.description: Brett Geary, as the organizer of Zorro Management, LLC, has designated Business Basics VL LLC as the resident agent for the company.
Gina Marie Bryan notarized the Articles of Organization signed by Brett Geary.

locations: Royal Palms Professional Building, 62-3A & 62-3B Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands 00802
Royal Palms Professional Building, 9053 Estate Thomas, Suite 101, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Zorro Management, LLC was organized under the Uniform Limited Liability Company Act in the Virgin Islands.
Brett Geary is the organizer of Zorro Management, LLC.
Business Basics VL LLC is designated as the resident agent for Zorro Management, LLC.
The company has a capital of One Thousand United States Dollars (US $1,000.00).
The document was notarized by Gina Marie Bryan on December 14, 2016.
